title: Backyard Composting | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Setting up a backyard compost container
Setting up a backyard compost container." Then, what subtasks go into that?

Setting up a backyard compost container, with subtasks of selecting a location, gathering materials, building the container, and adding ventilation. Then maybe additional notes on ongoing maintenance or resource visits are mentioned but not part of the main task. So only focusing on what's needed for setup. Since the user asks for tasks related to the transcript, which is building the container, that's the primary task.
Setting up a backyard compost container
subtasks: Finding a suitable location (warm spot, accessible for watering)
Building the container (assembling 2x4 sides, attaching with screws)
Adding wire mesh screen for ventilation and hinges for access
Visiting University of Wyoming Extension or barnyardsandbackyards.com for more information
